description: Chad Knight and David Grant didn't mean to come so early, but Trevor Hansen doesn't mind. He quickly asks them in. The host and his two guests dive into a buffet of manmeat -- tender flesh to savor and taste, thick hard dicks to swallow whole, and delicious manholes to lick clean. And the dessert to this sexy manfeast is their stuffing each other's assholes and creamin' all over.
title: Someone's Watching, Scene #03
